snippet.title: Anachronox [Part 1] | 4K 60FPS Full Game Walkthrough Gameplay |
snippet.description:
Anachronox 4K 60FPS Full Game Walkthrough Gameplay in three parts.

Part 2: https://youtu.be/4Va1Wjmcabk
Part 3: https://youtu.be/y3jBKsaC8Wg

In this videos i will cover the Full Walkthrough of the game. This includes all side-quests, weapons, upgrades and skills.

You can emphasise all of that information from the time-codes.

Enjoy the Great Game!
